pr_title: Precise error message when conf files contain invalid lines, fixes #872

timeline.message: Add clearer error messages when reading conf files
Avoid multiple var expansion and fixed WarpURLDecoded exception handling

timeline.bodyText: Rename parameter since it can now contain multiple files.
timeline.author: hbs

timeline.bodyText: Removing the System.exit call changes the behavior for callers other than the main method of WarpConfig, this will most likely break the behavior of many environment which initialize the Warp 10 config through this method, including the integration in Spark/Flink/Pig/KafkaStreams/NiFi and probably others.
timeline.author: hbs

replies.bodyText:
Changed the methods to take an extra parameter to do a System.exit or throw. If not specified, defaults to System.exit for backward-compatibility.
This parameter is the first in the methods because of the varargs and consistency between methods.
replies.author: ftence

timeline.message: Make WarpConfig exit on error by default, fix recursive safeSetProperties
